Name: Mahfuzakhon
description:
This woman with the beaming smile is named Mahfuzakhon. She is 35 years old, married, and raising three children. Mahfuzakhon is very friendly, open, and responsible by nature. Mahfuzakhon received a basic general education. For many years, she has been involved in agriculture as her main source of income. Her farm currently has 3 cows and 0.36 hectares of irrigated land where she grows organic garlic and potatoes.

Mahfuzakhon is trying to invest her savings in improving her living conditions, so that she can provide her children with a wonderful, comfortable life. For this reason, she applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 250,000 KGS to buy building materials and do some repairs on her home. The loan will help improve her familyâ€™s living conditions and create a comfortable life for her children.
